___language.description: Language filter of status bar item.

___text.description: Displayed text of status bar item.

___commandType.description:
Type of command.
1. 'exec': executes command e.g 'npm run serve' (default).
2. 'script': executes 'package.json' script.
3. 'palette': executes vscode registered command.
4. 'file': opens a file(s).

___color.description: Text color of status bar item.

___command.description:
Command content according to commandType:
1. 'exec': executes command e.g 'npm run serve' (default).
2. 'script': executes 'package.json' script.
3. 'palette': executes vscode registered command.
4. 'file': opens a file or an url (comma-separated list).
